answers.answer: I only had one drink and blood taken once :)
I drank one drink and they took my blood three times.
Usually you just have to drink one drink.
Thanks ladies! Was just a little confused :)

question: Im at the docs now doing my diabetes test, I remember with my first I had to drink 3 drinks and have 3 blood test done, the drink was also orange, this time I have had to drink one green drink and she jist took my blood for the 2nd time, am I meant to have another drink or did this test change?
title: diabetes drinks.
